First-authored papers

Takano, T., T. Nishimura, and H. Nakahra, 2023, Anisotropic seismic velocity variations in response to different orientations of tidal deformations, in prep.

Takano, T., T. Nishimura, H. Nakahara, E. Fujita, and H. Fujita, 2019, Sensitivity of seismic velocity changes to the tidal strain at different lapse-times: Data analyses of a small seismic array at Izu-Oshima volcano, Journal of Geophysical Research: Solid Earth,124. https://doi.org/10.1029/2018JB016235. [PDF]
